title: I need help with skin shards
body: Yeah, um, I have warwick and I just got a feral warwick skin shard, how do I upgrade it? I've tried double clicking, right clicking, I can't even activate it for christ's sake, not that I want to activate it, i just want the perm skin. Please help, I was really hype about the skin :(

replies.body: I was checking your account to see what might have been going wrong with that shard, but it looks like you got it working not too long ago! Hit me back up if you're still having issues getting that shard redeemed, otherwise enjoy ^_^!
